Label: util_bus_xfr
Expression: @np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_HIGH_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, (los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERS3')).clip(0), np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_MID_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, (los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERS2')).clip(0), (los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERS1')).clip(0))) * df.c_drive_transfer_for_segment * (access_mode == 'drive')

Label: util_ivt
Expression: @np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_HIGH_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID,los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'TOTALIVTT3'), np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_MID_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'TOTALIVTT2'), los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'TOTALIVTT1'))) * df.c_ivt_multiplier_for_segment * df.c_ivt_for_segment

Label: util_wait
Expression: @np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_HIGH_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FIRSTWAIT3'), np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_MID_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FIRSTWAIT2'), los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FIRSTWAIT1'))) * df.c_ivt_multiplier_for_segment * c_wait * df.c_ivt_for_segment

Label: util_xwait
Expression: @np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_HIGH_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERWAIT3'), np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_MID_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERWAIT2'), los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'XFERWAIT1'))) * df.c_ivt_multiplier_for_segment * c_xferwait * df.c_ivt_for_segment

Label: util_fare
Expression: @np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_HIGH_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FARE3'), np.where(df.demographic_segment==C_MID_INCOME_SEGMENT_ID, los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FARE2'), los.get_tappairs3d(df.btap, df.atap, df.tod, 'FARE1'))) * df.c_ivt_multiplier_for_segment * df.c_cost_for_segment
